Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly, and safely, included everything that was listed, and was in great condition for a used phone. HOWEVER, Battery life on the phone was shot, and i had to purchase a new battery and replacement kit off amazon also. Otherwise, PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: This seller ships products that don't work!
Reviews.Author: Whitney Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for my nephew. When I received it it appeared in good condition, but appearances can be misleading. It is stuck in the charge/upload moad. There is no possible way that they weren't aware of the problem before they shipped it out. It's apparent the second it "turns on" if you can even call it that. I spent many hours trying to fix it, but to no avail. They had a small return window for the holidays and I was out of town beyond the deadline, so now I am stuck with an expensive door stopper.

Reviews.Title: not as described
Reviews.Author: yezzeldeen
Reviews.Content: Hi, I bought an iphone 3g 16gb white,and it mentioned that its unlocked but when i got it i found it locked to AT&T; so I have to pay more to unlocked it

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented phone quality
Reviews.Author: tuko
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in Nov 2012.  Died Feb 2013. The phone was sold as "like New".  The day we activated it the vibration feature (suppose to turn on when in silence mode) did not work.  In addition, I have some Beats headphones that have the volume control on the cord. The phone would not recognize the volume control on the phone, my other Apple products(IPAD, Itouch) recognize it.  Three months later the battery started dieing really fast, it would not hold a charge very long.  I bought a new battery and when I went to replace it, the factory seal inside the phone had already been removed.  This phone should have been labeled "used-good condition".  This is definitely not a "Like new" phone.  Be careful of this seller.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Notwithoutmyheels
Reviews.Content: I got this phones and the charger was broken, and the power button was broken too. No wonder they were only 120.00. Wish I would've gone straight to the carrier and purchased the Iphone 4g.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered, I'm just surprised by the super slow performance.
Reviews.Author: Suzzette Medina
Reviews.Content: I know the phone is very old at this point so I was certainly not expecting anything fast, but the constant pausing, spontaneous crashes, and overall snail-pace functioning really disappointed me. The phone arrived as it was described and such, so thank you for the speedy delivery.

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected
Reviews.Author: FEDERICO A KLADT
Reviews.Content: Product was just what I was expecting. Came with all acessories, and original package. Mailing was also very expedite and I got the phone in less than 2 weeks (considering I'm in Brazil that was very good).

Reviews.Title: iPhone wasn't white
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: I did receive the iPhone on time but it wasn't as described. The description of the iPhone said white but the iPhone I received is black.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: fclenton
Reviews.Content: Doesn't even compare to an android some apps don't work hate that you have to do everthing on itunes all the hype was about nothing

Reviews.Title: Please would like more information about the product.
Reviews.Author: fernando
Reviews.Content: Hi, I bought an iphone 3g 16gb white, but can not get in the product specifications in your box if your charger or the phone itself. I would like to know something about their conditions. I hope you soon thanks
